sentences.english: Napoleon planned to strike a quick blow at his old enemy.
sentences.chinese: 拿破伦策划对他的宿敌实施迅雷不及掩耳的打击。

sentences.english: January 5, 2007, announced investment in Xunlei, a mega-file downloader
sentences.chinese: 2007年1月5日宣布投资大型文件下载工具迅雷。

sentences.english: She is so quick and will try to put her food into my mouth.
sentences.chinese: 她试着迅雷不及掩耳把自己的食物放到我的嘴里。

sentences.english: But unfortunately you might have found it no longer geilivable to use Xunlei to download this video.
sentences.chinese: 例如想用迅雷下载优酷上的视频但发现不给力？

sentences.english: Installation cannot proceed, as not all requirements were met.
sentences.chinese: 您不能在这个宗卷上安装“迅雷”。

sentences.english: One of the most distinct things you will notice about the Thunderbolt is the slab sides, or smooth sides if you will.
sentences.chinese: 迅雷上最为显著的就是就是它的平滑的侧面。

sentences.english: She is a member of the Thunderfoot tribe which also is T.
sentences.chinese: 她是迅雷部族的成员之一，也就是T。

sentences.english: That shift has already prompted rival Xunlei, which has a much stronger financial background, to delay its IPO.
sentences.chinese: 华尔街的态度转变已经让迅雷推迟了IPO计划。

sentences.english: Flagship corporations collapsing in the blink of an eye.
sentences.chinese: 大公司在迅雷不及掩耳的情况下一一倒塌。

sentences.english: It was nicknamed the “pushbutton car” because of its push button feature.
sentences.chinese: 迅雷因为它的按键功能被戏称为“按键车”。

sentences.english: Attaching the cross-members is the hardest part in building the Thunderbolt.
sentences.chinese: 附加交叉成员是最难的迅雷建设。

sentences.english: The Thunderbolt IGBT is a new generation of high voltage power IGBTs.
sentences.chinese: 迅雷IGBT是新一代高电压功率IGBT。

sentences.english: The company said in a statement that Ms Bartz was removed by the board of directors, effective immediately.
sentences.chinese: 而公司董事会的这一决定更是掩耳不及迅雷之速。

sentences.english: Mikazuki is traversing across the bamboo forest at lightning speed.
sentences.chinese: 三日月以迅雷不及掩耳的速度穿越竹林。

sentences.english: Thunder is good, and the English version is oso pretty nice.
sentences.chinese: 迅雷是好的，和英文版本奥索非常好。

sentences.english: At noon today, Thunder is also reported to the MPAA counterclaims news.
sentences.chinese: 今日中午，迅雷方面也传出将反诉MPAA的消息。

definition: Baidu, Internet portal and search engine, www.baidu.com, listed as BIDU on NASDAQ since 1999
Momo, GPS-based app for messaging, and potentially meeting up with, other Momo users (typically, strangers) in one's vicinity, launched in 2011
Ali Baba, character from The Arabian Nights
